Summary: Huge cigar shape object with 3 very large bright white windows
divs: sighting detailshi, my birthday was the next day on the 23d of feburary and i really wated to see a ufo. well it was about 1 in the morning when i was sitting at my computer playin a video game(dota). as the game was over i had to take a piss, i have these 2 doors right next to my computer so i opend one of em and stepd out onto the steps to take a piss. well when i came outside i see this thing.. it was to the left of my house about 100 ft in the air,right above the tree in my neighbors yard, it was moving, made almost no noise expect this high pictch sound as it felw by very slowly,(i thought the sound was my a\c running later to realize it wasnt on that night) like 5-10 mph. this obeject was huge like almost a football field metelic like metal and had the biggest 3 windows spaced out perfectally in the middle of the craft with the brightest wite light comming from these 3 square windows. when i saw the craft i was stunned. i thought it was a plane or a helicopter or even a blimp but it was verywindy and was too low to be anything else and made no noise really. while i just stood there in aww it was slowly moving away from me. i stodd there for about 5 minutes and watced it as it moved to the next street than turned left to go twards the woods. the left turn it made was instant like noting i have ever seen before. i saw the same side the whole time. it slowly made it way twoards the woods and i lost it behind the trees. i went inside after that and went to sleep wonderig what i had just saw. i told my friends about it the next day and non of them believed me. it was like nothing i have ever seen before in my life.
